town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** June 11, 2025 | **Duration:** 97 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Draft press release on ERA nature-based ocean solutions for UN Oceans Conference; include promising initiatives not presented at conference](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=3857.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Submit proposal for $100M "bright blue fund" to re-brighten ocean planet Earth in Monaco this week](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=4135.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Compile list of ocean restoration recommendations from meeting transcript for future use](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5454.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Update ERA white paper with new info from meeting, esp. underwater munitions issue](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5703.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Distribute meeting recording, transcript, and white paper link to attendees who provided email addresses](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5767.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Ocean dimming and warming pose critical threats, requiring urgent action to "re-brighten" the planet](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1068.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Mineral dust replenishment and seaweed restoration show promise for revitalizing ocean ecosystems and sequestering carbon](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1179.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Chemical munitions dumping presents a severe, under-addressed hazard to marine life](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5352.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Multi-pronged approach needed: emissions reduction, carbon removal, and climate repair](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1847.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Ocean Dimming and Warming

- [Earth has dimmed 0.5% in 20 years, absorbing more heat](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1201.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Loss of marine clouds and sea ice exacerbating warming](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1254.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [93% of planetary warming going into oceans](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1445.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [IMO sulfur emission reductions linked to rapid ocean warming](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1545.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Mineral Dust Replenishment

- [Iron-rich dust catalyzes phytoplankton growth (1:1,000,000 ratio)](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1184.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [2012 project: 100 tons dust led to record salmon catch, removed 100M tons CO2](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1375.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Cost-effective: ~$0.10/ton CO2 removed](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1481.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Potential to rapidly cool planet and restore marine ecosystems](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1424.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Seaweed and Kelp Restoration

- [90% loss of kelp forests off US/Australia coasts](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1693.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Marine permaculture approaches show promise](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1188.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Seaweeds produce cloud-forming compounds (e.g. DMS, isoprene)](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1741.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [India pledged to increase seaweed production from 30k to 1M tons by 2025](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1782.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Chemical Munitions Contamination

- [Widespread dumping since 1910s in most global seas](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5605.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Releasing toxins, causing anoxic zones and mass fish kills](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5698.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Attacks plankton photosynthesis, bleaches coral, causes fish tumors](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5995.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Lack of study/action in North America despite European efforts](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5447.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Cloud Brightening and Aerosols

- [Marine clouds crucial for planetary cooling](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1100.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Biogenic aerosols from kelp, phytoplankton aid cloud formation](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1741.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Restoring 1978-level cloud cover could offset 1.4x current CO2 warming](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5169.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Land-Based Solutions

- [Reforestation potential: 500 gigatons carbon from converted farmland](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1961.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Precision agriculture could allow rewilding of farmland](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=4020.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Pine forests produce cloud-forming terpenes](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=1806.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Develop comprehensive list of ocean restoration recommendations](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5465.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Pursue "Bright Blue Fund" proposal ($100M) for ocean re-brightening projects](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=4156.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Consider press release on nature-based solutions for UN Oceans Conference](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5888.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Organize follow-up masterclass expanding on topics and inviting new experts](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5486.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Distribute meeting recording, transcript, and existing white paper to participants](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5562.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Incorporate new information (e.g. munitions contamination) into ERA resources](https://fathom.video/share/HQMbWNzZW-wPzHH9c8FxizRi9ThBEJ-F?tab=summary&timestamp=5725.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)

data.company: Carnegie Mellon University - School of Computer Science - Human-Computer Interaction Institute

transcript_mentions.context:
9:14 - Jon Schull (Enabling The Future)
  Thank you. Scott Edmundson?

9:23 - Scott Edmundson
  Good morning. I'm Scott Edmundson. I'm with Pacific Northwest National Labs. I'm a research scientist.
